string.text: Clear area of mutants
Mutants are about. Hunt them down and clear the area.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Some mutants howling. Still gives me the chills after all this time. How about you go out there and take care of them? I'll make it worth your while.
Haha! Well done, stalker! Have a drink on Beard!
Find the %s Artefact for Beard
Beard wants you to find the %s artefact for him.
I deal in artefacts. I usually don't buy them from stalkers, but there is one in particular I would like to get my hands on. Do you want to try to get it for me?
I'm looking for the %s artefact. You ever seen one? If you can find it, I'll make sure you're well paid.
Good hunting, stalker! Have a drink on the house!
Diplomat
Convince the military commander to call off his search for a fellow stalker.

There's a guy; Spetsnaz is looking for him. He's been hiding out here for weeks. They say he ran through the Brain Scorcher to escape them. I don't know how he survived, though he ain't quite right in the head anymore... Anyway, you want to help the poor fellow? I happen to know where the military commander who wants him is stationed. Maybe you can convince him to leave the guy alone.
Ah, you killed him! Well, that's effective diplomacy! Good man! Free drinks for you!
Obtain part of the monster's body
Beard asks for a mutant: %s.
There was an order for a part of monsters from scientists, you undertake?
Please, please %s.
Keep the profits.
Get the meat of the monster
Beard asks for mutant meat: %s.
I decided to try something that is edible from the meat of the local fauna, so you need to go and get meat mutants. You take?
Please, please %s.
Keep the profits.
Eliminate Target
Find and eliminate the target then return to Sultan for payment.

There are many people in the Zone who have rubbed me the wrong way or shown me disrespect. Some of these pricks either owe me money or fucked up some deal. These people are nothing but rats that need stomped out. If you are up for the task, I will give you their information so that you can track them through GPS.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Find %s
%s are required by Cardan to install basic equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
Not only do I need some more booze, but I could really use a good set of tools, stalker. If you're interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great, stalker. You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
Find %s
%s are required by Cardan to install advanced equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
I could really use more tools and vodka... but the vodka is easy to find. What I need from you is more tools; better tools. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Fantastic! Feel free to stop by any time for a drink or if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Find %s
%s are required by Cardan to install expert equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
I could really use more tools and vodka... but the vodka is easy to find. What I need from you is more tools; better tools. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Fantastic! Feel free to stop by any time for a drink or if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Safe place: get to Skadovsk
In the Zone is relatively safe only in large camps. It makes sense to get to the nearest one-Skadovsk.
Maps of the locality: find interested
Maps of the area: suggest the Pilot
Maps of the area between Zaton and Jupiter may be of interest to the Pilot, a local guide.
Scat 2: explore the place of fall
Investigate the place of the fall of the helicopter Scat-2.
Scat 5: explore the place of fall
Scat 5: Find the cause of the electronics burnout
Scat squad: find the source of the ranks that hit two helicopters
Investigate the place of the fall of the helicopter Scat-5.
It is necessary to find out the source of a powerful electrical discharge that hit the Scat-5 helicopter.
It is necessary to find the reason why the electronics of the helicopters Scat-4 and Scat-5 were burnt. At the inspection it was found out that both cars were hit by a powerful electric discharge.
Supplies: get food for mercenaries
A detachment of mercenaries stationed in substation shops asks them to bring supplies-a total of six cans of canned food, sticks of sausage or loaves.
Supplies: carry food to mercenaries
It is necessary to attribute the collected supplies to the mercenaries stationed in the shops of the substation.
Tools: inspect substation shops
It is rumored that there can be tools in substation shops. Perhaps there are some that need a technique.
Hunt for a chimera: find a mutant while he sleeps
You need to find a chimera until she wakes up.
In search of Magpies: tell Gaunt
It seems that Soroka- the stalker who framed the group of Gonta-was found. Now he joined the Freedom group and calls himself Fire Chimera.
Chimera Hunt: Kill the mutant
the Chimera woke up. It is necessary to kill her while there is such an opportunity.
Hunting for a chimera: to meet with Gonta in a bar at three o'clock in the morning
It is necessary to meet with Gonta before dawn, so that together with his group go out to hunt a chimera.
Hunting for a chimera: to report to St. John's wort
It is necessary to inform the stalker named Hypericum about the successful hunt for a chimera-he should give out a reward.
In search of Magpies: find a stalker
Stalker named Soroka framed the group of Gaunt under the attack of the chimera. the guys are asking to find the bastard.
Evacuation points: check point B205
On the map found in one of the helicopters, evacuation points were marked. It is necessary to check whether the military appeared at point B205.
Evacuation points: check point B28
On the map, found in one of the helicopters, points of evacuation are marked. It is necessary to check whether the military appeared at point B28.
Place of evacuation: find the coordinates of point B28

On the record, which was preserved in the black box of one of the Scat group's helicopters, the commander of the group indicates the picking site- the so-called B28 evacuation point. It is necessary to determine its coordinates.
Location of evacuation: get to point B28
the point of gathering, where the military was to be assembled, is transition Pripyat. We need to find a way to get there.
Evacuation points: check point B2
On the map found in one of the helicopters, evacuation points were marked. It is necessary to check whether the military appeared at the point of evacuation B2.
A strange phenomenon: bring an artifact to the beard
the source of the strange glow was no less strange artifact. He will obviously be interested in Beard.
A strange phenomenon: to question stalkers about an artifact
Perhaps stalkers know something about a strange artifact, or tell someone who can know. It is worth talking to them.
A strange phenomenon: to find the source of glow on the dredger
On the dredger was noticed an unusual even for the Zone glow. the beard asks to determine its source.
A strange phenomenon: take an artifact
the source of the strange glow is no less strange artifact. It's worth taking it with you.
A strange phenomenon: tell the beard about the artifact
the source of the strange glow was no less strange artifact. It's worth telling about this Beard, even if the artifact itself is not with him.
the way to the plateau: jump into an anomaly
It seems that the way to the plateau lies through the anomaly. It is necessary to jump into it.
the way to the plateau: find a personal move Noah
the PDA Noah mentioned a personal move to the plateau. It is necessary to discover this road.
the way to the plateau: find the way from Noah
They say that a stalker named Noah knows the way to the plateau. It is necessary to know this road.
Disappearance of stalkers: bring evidence of Tremor's guilt
It is necessary to carry the flash-drive with Tremor's records to Skadovsk and show the beard. From the records it is clear that in the disappearance of stalkers the medic is guilty.
Disappearance of stalkers: find evidence of Tremor's guilt
It is necessary to determine whether Tremor left any evidence of his guilt in the disappearance of stalkers.
Scat 3: explore the place of fall
Investigate the place of the fall of the helicopter Scat-3.
It is necessary to bring an artifact on the instructions of Beards. However, the time has already passed, now competitors are also looking for an order.
You need to bring an artifact to Beard. Do not forget that competitors are also trying to fulfill this order.

You need to bring an artifact to Beard, but the signal from another group indicates that they have already found the right one. There is an opportunity to track the signal and get ahead of competitors.
You need to bring an artifact to Beard, but another group has already completed the order. Now for the artifact will be able to gain only half the price.
It is necessary to bring an artifact on the instructions of Beards.
Artifacts to order: bring the Gravy artifact
Artifacts made to order: bring an artifact of the Eye
Artifacts to order: bring artifact Bubble
Artifacts to order: bring artifact Dummy
Artifacts to order: bring artifact Goldfish
Artifacts made to order: bring an artifact Flame
Artifacts to order: bring artifact Firefly
Artifacts to order: bring artifact Snowflake
It is necessary to find an artifact on the instructions of the Beard, but the time for the odds turned out. Now competitors are also looking for an order.
You need to find the artifact on the instructions of Beards. Do not forget that competitors are also looking for an order.

You need to find the artifact on the instructions of Beard, but came a signal from another group-they already found the artifact. There is an opportunity to track the signal and get ahead of competitors.
You need to find the artifact on the instructions of Beards, but another group has already completed the order. Now you can get only half the price for the artifact.
You need to find the artifact on the instructions of Beards.
Artifacts made to order: find the Gravy artifact
Artifacts to order: find the artifact Eye
Artifacts to order: find artifact Bubble
Artifacts to order: find artifact Dummy
Artifacts to order: find artifact Goldfish
Artifacts to order: find the artifact Flame
Artifacts to order: find artifact Firefly
Artifacts to order: find the artifact Snowflake
Compass: Find Noah and find out where you can get this rare artifact
You need to find Noah on an old barge and find out where you can get a rare Compass artifact. the beard has been looking for this artifact for a long time and is ready to pay well for it.
Compass: Bring the Artifact Beard
Compass: learn from Noah, where you can get an artifact
the Sultan wants to intercept the artifact that the Beard is looking for. You need to find Noah on an old barge and find out where you can get the artifact.
Compass: Bring an artifact to Sultan
the artifact that Noah gave is the Compass needed by the Sultan.
Dark business: get interest from Borodia
It makes sense to take away from Boroda the interest due from his income.
A tempting business: to talk with Sultan
Merchant Sych believes that Beard does not fulfill the terms of the transaction, and advises to seek help from local authority-Sultan.
Dark business: pick up detectors from stalkers

It is necessary in any way to select prototypes of detectors from stalkers who are looking for artifacts for Beards. When the Beard is deprived of detectors, he will have to agree to the conditions of the Sultan.
Dark business: talk to Sultan
the beard has already lost detectors. You need to come to Sultan and find out if he has solved the problem with other Beard suppliers.
Dark business: to make Borodu work for Sultan
Now Beard cannot do business on his own: he has neither suppliers, nor detectors. It is necessary to make him work for the Sultan.
Dark business: learn about the current affairs of the Beard
It is necessary to find out what kind of affairs the Beard is currently engaged in. This will help to cut off the channels of its supply.
Dark business: pick up the second detector from stalkers

It is necessary in any way to select prototypes of detectors from stalkers who are looking for artifacts for Beards. When the Beard is deprived of detectors, he will have to agree to the conditions of the Sultan.
A tempting business: to bring Garinu three detectors Velez
Merchant Sych proposed to participate in one profitable business. To do this, you need to find three detectors Veles, take them to the bunker of scientists and give it to Garina.
A tempting business: wait for Detectors to receive Sychom
Garin took the detectors and said that he himself would transfer them to the Sychev back. It is necessary to wait for Garin to work with the detectors, and then to learn from Sych the results.
A tempting business: to talk with Sychom
the trader Sych on the radio signaled that he had problems, and asked to go to him.
A tempting business: to convince Beard to follow an agreement
Merchant Sych believes that Beard does not fulfill the terms of the transaction. It is necessary to talk with Boroda and force him to adhere to the arrangements.
A tempting business: demand a share from Sych
the beard does not recognize what Sychu owes. It is necessary to find out which of the traffickers is right, and to demand from the offender his share.

Stalker Koryaga asks for a container with his things. He hid the container in the old ZAZ Car, but after the earthquake the car fell through into a rift. Koryaga himself is afraid to go down: there are snorkels.
the container of Koryagi is received. Now you need to transfer it to the owner and split the content.
Lair of bloodsuckers: tell stalkers
It is necessary to inform stalkers about the lair of bloodsuckers, found under the VNZ Circle.
Lair of bloodsuckers: tell the beard
It is necessary to tell the beard about the lair of bloodsuckers, found under the VNZ Circle: he knows what to do for the safety of stalkers.
Disappearance of stalkers: follow Glukhar
the wood grouse asks to examine with him the abandoned building of the VNZ. He noticed the bloodsuckers and wants to check if there is a hunter.
Disappearance of stalkers: to figure out what happened
It seems that Tremor is not so harmless. It is necessary to understand what happened here.
Disappearance of stalkers: find Wood Grouse
the grouse went for some reason to the port cranes-perhaps something had learned about the missing stalkers. We need to look it up there.
Disappearance of stalkers: find out where Wood grouse
Glukharya is not in his usual place. It is worth asking Boroda where he went.
Disappearance of stalkers: find the missing hunter

the grouse asked for help in the search for the missing hunter, who was looking for the lair of bloodsuckers. According to available information, it is the bloodsuckers who are involved in all the recent disappearances of stalkers.
Disappearance of stalkers: get out of the lair of bloodsuckers

In the basement, a lair of bloodsuckers was found, and the creatures are in a state of strange numbness. It is necessary to get out of here-and at the same time it is very desirable not to make noise.
Disappearance of stalkers: to meet with Gluhar
Perhaps, it is worth to meet with Gluhar and talk about the further search for a hunter.
Disappearance of stalkers: to meet with Gluhara later

In the building there were no traces of Danila-a hunter. However, the Capercaillie seems to be puzzled by what it was possible to detect inside the VNZ; he asks to meet with him later-he wants to find out some details.
Disappearance of stalkers: to meet with Glukhar
In the place indicated by Gluhar, there was only a dead bloodsucker and no traces of hunter Danila. But Glukhar itself, obviously, found something interesting and asks to join him.
As it turned out, in the disappearance of stalkers, bloodsuckers are not to blame, and Tremor is a medic from Skadovsk.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu

Cardan asked to find two sets of tools: one for fine work, another for rough. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu

Cardan asked to find two sets of tools: one for rough work, another for calibration. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu
Cardan asked to find a set of tools for rough work. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu

Cardan asked to find two sets of tools: one for fine work, another for calibration. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu
Cardan asked to find a set of tools for fine work. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu
Cardan asked to find a set of tools for calibration. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Tools: bring tools to Cardanu

Cardan asked to find three sets of tools: for rough work, for fine work, plus a set for calibration. the technician will pay for the instrument and, in addition, will be able to provide more sophisticated upgrading of weapons or bulletproof vests.
Camp mercenaries: pick up any information found
the merchant Sych promised to pay well for any information carrier found in the mercenaries camp at the waste recycling station. He is interested in the plans of mercenaries.
Camp mercenaries: carry with them any information found
the merchant Sych promised to pay well for any information carrier found in the mercenaries camp at the waste recycling station. He is interested in the plans of mercenaries.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of the Barge
Cardan asked to apologize to his friend-a stalker called Barge. They quarreled, and he left in an unknown direction.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of Barge and Joker
Cardan asked to apologize to his fellow stalkers Barge and Joker. After the quarrel, the boys left in an unknown direction.
Three comrades: learn about the fate of the Joker
Cardan asked to apologize to his friend-a stalker named Joker. They quarreled, and he left in an unknown direction.
Special order: pick up the goods
the order was delivered, it is necessary to take it from Shustroi.
Special order: expect delivery
Order is done. We must wait until Nimble gets the goods.
Reputation: find Koryag

It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. Shustro never sold stolen goods, but Koryaga, most likely, was used to lying awfully well. the last time he was seen by the port cranes-maybe he's still there.
It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. the port cranes Koryagi not-but perhaps the band its know where he is.
It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. It seems that the band its are involved in this matter and know where to look for the Koryagh.
It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. So far there are no clues about his whereabouts.

It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. Judging by the flash-drive found at one of the bandits, the people of Sultan are looking for Koryag. However, where exactly to look for it, it is not known.
Reputation: find out where the Koryag went missing
At the former place No Koryagi. You should ask the local-maybe someone saw where he went.
It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. At the former place it is not. Perhaps the Sultan knows where to find Koryag.
It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. At the former place, No Koryagi; Perhaps the Beard knows anything.
Reputation: talk to Koryagoy
It is necessary to find Koryag and force him to bite his tongue. Shustro never sold stolen goods, but Koryaga, most likely, was used to lying awfully well.
Lair of bloodsuckers: find the ventilation shaft
Find the ventilation shaft to let the poison gas into the lair of the bloodsuckers.
Lair of bloodsuckers: find poison gas
To destroy the lair, poison gas is necessary. Owl should know where such a thing can be found.
To destroy the lair, poison gas is necessary. Sych argues that gas cylinders should be present in the abandoned military convoy.
Lair of bloodsuckers: find the keys for the container
the found documentation mentions the keys to the container with the gas cylinder. It is necessary to find them.
Lair of bloodsuckers: find a way to open a container with a gas cylinder
the container in which the gas cylinder is stored is closed. You need to find a way to open it.
Lair of bloodsuckers: install a gas cylinder
Install the gas cylinder in the ventilation system of the basements of the VNZ. the gas, having penetrated through the ventilation shaft, will fill the cellars and destroy the bloodsuckers.
Lair of bloodsuckers: tell the beard about the destruction of the den
It makes sense to inform the Beard that the lair of bloodsuckers has been destroyed and Skadovsk is now out of danger.
Lair of bloodsuckers: turn the valve
Turn the valve so that the poisonous gas penetrates through the ventilation shaft into the cellars where the bloodsucker's lair is.
Lair of bloodsuckers: wait until the gas acts.
We must make sure that the gas got into the lair and all the bloodsuckers were destroyed.
Deal: to meet with band its near the forestry
Sultan asked to participate in the transaction with one huckster. It is necessary to accompany the people of Sultan to the place of meeting and cover them in case of unforeseen circumstances.
Deal: meet the merchant
Owl offered work-to guard some merchant during the transaction. Obviously, the transaction is of a doubtful nature and in the process there may be trouble.
Deal: meet with stalkers near the forestry
Meet with the stalkers near the forestry and help them prevent a deal between band its and the arms dealer.
Deal: guard the merchant
According to the trader, the task is simple: to guard it during the transaction.
Deal: overhear conversation
Stalkers want to overhear the conversation between the band its and the arms dealer.
Deal: prevent the purchase of weapons
It is necessary in any way to prevent a deal between band its and huckster.
Deal: remove witnesses
the deal with the huckster broke. It is necessary to remove all witnesses.
Deal: protect the merchant
It is necessary to protect the merchant. In addition, he ordered the removal of all witnesses to the transaction, including his own clients.
Deal: search the merchant
the trader could have important information. It is necessary to take it away-it can come in handy.
Deal: cover the band its during the deal
While the band its will negotiate with the huckster, one must be on the alert and, in case of anything, cover them up.
Deal: talk to the merchant
Terms of the deal with the merchant are fulfilled, it remains to pick up the reward.
Deal: get a reward from Beard
Beard promised a reward if the deal between the band its and the huckster was broken. Since now the deal certainly will not take place, you can go for a reward.
Deal: talk to the leader of the bandits
It is necessary to inform the leader of the band its about their willingness to take part in the deal.
Hitting: decide what to do
Impact: attack stalkers
Hitting: get reward
the attack on the camp is repulsed, you can talk to the stalkers and get a reward. Most likely, stalkers would have had to be tight, if they had not been warned about the attack.
the group of stalkers decided to turn into a gang and rob their own colleagues of yesterday. It's time to decide how to be: to participate in a raid, to warn future victims or not to interfere?
Hitting: wait for the appointed time
Hitting: wait for the right moment
Unavailable cache: bring the Koryag container
Deal: talk to the leader of the detachment of stalkers
the deal is broken, the arms dealer is dead. It is necessary to talk with the leader of the detachment of stalkers
Disappearance of stalkers: to tell on Skadovsk about what happened
It is necessary to open the container with the found keys and get out of it a balloon with poison gas
Lair of bloodsuckers: get a gas bottle from a container
Hitting: attack robbers
It is necessary to attack the robbers from the back to help the stalkers repel the attack.
Hitting: to meet with robbers
Participate with the robbers in the attack on the camp of stalkers.
Hitting: join the ranks of robbers
the stalkers asked to help them repel the robbers' attack. It is necessary to join the ranks of the robbers, then during the attack it will be possible to calmly attack them from the back.
Robbers should wait near Shevchenko. It will be necessary to meet with them to participate in the attack on stalkers.
Wait until the meeting with the robbers: they want to attack the camp of stalkers late at night, in the dark. the agreed meeting place is Shevchenko.
Hitting: talk to robbers
the attack on the stalkers was successful. Now we need to talk with accomplices.
It is necessary to wait until the robbers are distracted by the raids. Then you can hit them in the back to help stalkers at Shevchenko.
Dark business: start working on Beard
In order to select prototypes of detectors from stalkers working on Beard, it is necessary to join their ranks. This will help to find out the camp of competitors
It is necessary to take the container and take it to the owner.
In the on-board computer of the Scat-2 helicopter there were maps of the area between Zaton and Jupiter. It is worth to find someone to whom these cards may be needed.
Way to the plateau: ask stalkers
Apparently, the plateau will not be able to get straight ahead. It is necessary to ask local stalkers about other possible ways.
the artefact obtained from Noah is the same Compass that the Boroda needs.
